column4: okay i got to installl Googel earth by using the sh command okay because its just one bin file now ... how do i install firefox and thunderbird after downloading them directly from mozilla website?
okay where do i get the newest .deb? for firefox and thunderbird?
FYI googleearth is in the Medibuntu repository if you add it -- it's better to use programs from repositories then bin files you download - this way they get updated!
